LanguageData.ThrumboWool.label: thrumbo Wool
LanguageData.ThrumboWool.description: Rare, beautiful and provides very good insulation. Thrumbo Wool clothes is a extravagances.
LanguageData.ThrumboMilk.label: Thrumbo Milk
LanguageData.ThrumboMilk.description: This rare and longevity animal’s milk is mellow and intoxicating, which contains special ingredients nourishing the stomach, improve the body's immunity. This expensive drink is only Glitter World aristocracy can enjoy.
